Text:
Awsome Work as always Guys

Small REQ,
can you add a txt file to the torrents with the description to the file list?

Just makes it easier to catalogue and quickview.

Cheers

Thanks @Aanea and @Osiris11.

@Osiris11, dont know what you mean exactly, isnt this something you can do after downloading them ??

@shallow2 
sure that's what I have been doing, cut n past your descritpion into a txt file n dropping into the folder.

no biggy mate, was just a thought, seeing you're pasting the info here for each one...

Thanks for all work you guys do. :)
As always thanks for the ups!
